overview: Joe Slovak is a brilliant first-year med student whose casual, nonconforming approach to life gets tested when he enrolls in Gross Anatomy, the toughest course in med school.
tagline: No one thought a real rebel like Joe would make it through medical school. But they didn't know Joe.
cast: Matthew Modine|Daphne Zuniga|Christine Lahti|Todd Field|John Scott Clough
